#-----main-----

a, b = map(int, input().split())

if a <= b:
    print(0)
else:
    print(a - (a // b) * b)


def main():
    A, B = map(int, input().split(" "))
    print(A - B)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

else:

    print(a - b)

a, b = map(int, input().split())

if a <= b:
    print(0)

    print(A - B)

a, b = map(int, input().split())

print(max(a - 2 * b, 0))

#-----main-----
a, b = map(int, input().split())

if a <= b:
    print(0)
else:
    print(a - b)


def main():
    A, B = map(int, input().split())
    print(A - B)  # print(A - B)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
